content.description:
Statue of Queen Njinga Created Circa 2000 on Public Display in Angola, West Africa

Queen Njinga stands upright with a stern facial expression.
Queen Njinga wears a crown, highly decorated clothing, and elaborate jewelry.
Queen Njinga holds an axe in her right hand.
mtcurado/Getty Images
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the purpose of the statue?

choices.label: To remember Queen Njingaâ€™s fight against the Portuguese attempt to establish slave-trading practices in Africa
To thank the Portuguese for supporting the military success of Ndongo
To commemorate Queen Njinga as a skilled military and political leader
To honor the Kingdom of Benin soldiers killed in battle

content.answer: To commemorate Queen Njinga as a skilled military and political leader
